experiences.title: Founder & Lead Software Engineer - Local Venue Discovery App/Service
experiences.description: Initiated, designed, and currently developing a full-stack mobile/web app connecting users to local bars and restaurants, leveraging React Native, ReactJS, Node.js, and Supabase for cross-platform functionality and real-time data syncing.

experiences.title: Lead Programming Instructor
experiences.description: Designed a 2-month curriculum and delivered discussions, demonstrations, and activities to over 60 students on programming topics such as encryption, authentication, and networking.

experiences.title: Course Assistant - Data Structures & Algorithms
experiences.description: Assisted in teaching a large-scale undergraduate course (over 600 students) on data structures and algorithms using Java, conducting weekly discussion sections, office hours, and grading assignments.
